
# ToDo App
## About
The Todo App is a task management tool to help users stay organized in their daily activities.

## Technologies used
- JavaScript
- HTML5
- CSS3

## Characteristics and description
The Todo App has the following features:

- Add new tasks (Title, date, description)
- Edit tasks
- Delete tasks
- View all tasks
